markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Communication Pendants](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1463)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each of these matching necklaces has been constructed using one half of a purple teardrop-shaped gem, split in two. These pendants function only with the other pendant in their pair and must be crafted together. If one pendant becomes broken, the other shatters into non-magical shards. The Price listed above is for a pair of pendants. 

<document level="2" id="action-1104" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Communication Pendants
